location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 20 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū] to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that the Shaikh of Katiffe [Al-Qaṭīf], Mohomed been Erraher, has agreed to join the General Maritime Treaty 1820; it is the Resident's intention to visit Katiffe next October, so that the Shaikh can officially sign the treaty.
